summary: **Better Call Saul** is a TV show about a lawyer named Jimmy McGill (played by Bob Odenkirk). It's a spin-off from the popular series **Breaking Bad**. The story starts years before **Breaking Bad**, showing how Jimmy becomes the shady lawyer Saul Goodman. It also follows a former police officer, Mike (Jonathan Banks), who gets involved with drug traffickers. The show is set in Albuquerque, New Mexico, and has received lots of praise for its great acting and storytelling. It has won many awards and is considered one of the best TV shows ever.
title: Better Call Saul
